医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
脑部扫描可以检测一些反应迟钝的患者的意识由麻省总医院专家共同领导的一项新研究发现，脑部扫描可以检测一些反应迟钝的脑损伤患者的意识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Brain-scans-can-detect-thought-in-some-unresponsive-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Brain-scans-can-detect-thought-in-some-unresponsive-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cba31279-05e1-45ce-bdac-9de0f3df73ff Wed, 14 Aug 2024 21:12:23 -0400 Brain scans can detect consciousness in some unresponsive patients
未经治疗的高血压与老年人患阿尔茨海默病的风险较高有关与已经或正在接受高血压治疗的人和没有慢性病的人相比，60 岁及以上患有未经治疗的高血压的人患阿尔茨海默病的风险可能会增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Untreatment-high-blood-Pressure-linked-to-higher-Alzheimers-risk-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Untreatment-high-blood-Pressure-linked-to-higher-Alzheimers-risk-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=401e0169-9838-45bb-9245-deeac44be930 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 21:06:33 -0400 Untreated high blood pressure linked to higher Alzheimer's risk in older adults
天气、地理位置似乎会影响水传播传染病的住院治疗哥伦比亚大学研究人员于 2019 年进行的一项新研究显示，对美国 25 个不同州 500 多家医院 12 年来收集的数据进行分析表明，天气、地理位置以及城市或乡村位置似乎都会影响水传播传染病的住院治疗。开放获取期刊 PLOS Water。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Weather-geographic-location-appear-to-influence-hospitalizations-for-waterborne-infectious-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Weather-geographic-location-appear-to-influence-hospitalizations-for-waterborne-infectious-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2692741e-36ee-4fe8-a54e-2d2da184d698 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 20:58:19 -0400 Weather, geographic location appear to influence hospitalizations for waterborne infectious diseases
饮食衍生分子被确定为年轻发病结直肠癌风险的主要驱动因素克利夫兰诊所的一项新研究发现，饮食衍生的代谢物分子是年轻发病结直肠癌风险的主要驱动因素，尤其是那些与红肉和加工肉类相关的分子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Diet-driven-molecules-identified-as-main-drivers-of-young-onset-colorectal-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Diet-driven-molecules-identified-as-main-drivers-of-young-onset-colorectal-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef798450-bba8-492a-8e59-acd6d827fc3c Wed, 14 Aug 2024 20:48:45 -0400 Diet-derived molecules identified as main drivers of young-onset colorectal cancer risk
研究揭示了对 T 系急性淋巴细胞白血病理解的范式转变费城儿童医院 (CHOP)、圣裘德儿童研究医院 (St. Jude) 和儿童肿瘤学小组 (COG) 的研究人员今天宣布，对 T 系急性淋巴细胞白血病 (T-ALL) 的理解发生了重大范式转变一种侵袭性高风险的癌症，通常由 DNA 非编码部分的基因变化引起。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Study-reveals-a-paradigm-shift-in-the-understanding-of-T-lineage-acute-lymphoblastic-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Study-reveals-a-paradigm-shift-in-the-understanding-of-T-lineage-acute-lymphoblastic-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b9f55919-54fa-4125-95cc-9d3de3306ff4 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 20:43:26 -0400 Study reveals a paradigm shift in the understanding of T-lineage acute lymphoblastic leukemia
突破性疟疾疫苗为孕妇提供长期保护在《柳叶刀传染病》杂志上发表的一份报告中（PfSPZ 疫苗对马里健康成年人和预期怀孕妇女预防疟疾的安全性和有效性：两项随机、双盲、安慰剂对照 1 期和 2 期试验）由研究人员领导的团队马里巴马科疟疾研究和培训中心 (MRTC)；美国国立卫生研究院国家过敏和传染病研究所疟疾免疫学和疫苗学实验室 (LMIV)； Sanaria Inc. 描述了 Sanaria® PfSPZ 疫苗在怀孕前给予女性时所显示的针对疟疾的持久保护功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Breakthrough-malaria-vaccine-offers-long-term-protection-for-pregnant-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Breakthrough-malaria-vaccine-offers-long-term-protection-for-pregnant-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0ecbd38-4bff-4124-9849-430688b31d6f Wed, 14 Aug 2024 20:26:38 -0400 Breakthrough malaria vaccine offers long-term protection for pregnant women
工程细胞外囊泡有望治疗 1 型糖尿病我们每个人体内都有一支细胞大军，其首要职责是抵御外部病原体和内部威胁，例如增殖的癌细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Engineering-extracellular-vesicles-for-potial-treatment-of-type-1-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Engineering-extracellular-vesicles-for-pottial-treatment-of-type-1-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6eca57de-e40a-4043-926a-9ba17f7cd0d3 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 20:22:49 -0400 Engineering extracellular vesicles for potential treatment of type 1 diabetes
新试验探索 BAFF CAR T 细胞疗法治疗复发性骨髓瘤大学医院 (UH) Seidman 癌症中心的血液学家兼肿瘤学家 Leland Metheny 医学博士正在领导这项试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/New-trial-explores-BAFF-CAR-T-cell-therapy-for-relapsed-myeloma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/New-trial-explores-BAFF-CAR-T-cell-therapy-for-relapsed-myeloma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5bb02a77-be96-43c9-8713-e26ba5a6ac64 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 20:18:29 -0400 New trial explores BAFF CAR T-cell therapy for relapsed myeloma
实验性疟疾疫苗有望保护孕妇美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 支持的两项实验性疟疾疫苗在健康马里成年人中进行的试验发现，所有三种测试方案都是安全的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Experimental-malaria-vaccine-shows-promise-in-protecting-pregnant-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Experimental-malaria-vaccine-shows-promise-in-protecting-pregnant-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80690858-7685-4cf8-835d-b55a44faf7e0 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 20:15:05 -0400 Experimental malaria vaccine shows promise in protecting pregnant women
极低热量的酮饮食可减少脂肪和氧化应激，促进肥胖症的代谢健康研究表明，为期 11 周的极低热量生酮饮食可显着减少肥胖个体的体脂并改善葡萄糖代谢，同时还降低氧化应激标记物，表明整体代谢健康状况更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Very-low-calorie-keto-diet-slashes-fat-and-oxidative-stress-boosting-metabolic-health-in-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240814/Very-low-calorie-keto-diet-slashes-fat-and-oxidative-stress-boosting-metabolic-health-in-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=759ebd30-7b31-487a-9ebf-447c0dd43d11 Wed, 14 Aug 2024 19:58:00 -0400 Very-low-calorie keto diet slashes fat and oxidative stress, boosting metabolic health in obesity
